com.facebook.buck.rules

Interface Description<T extends ConstructorArg>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The object describing the parameters to be passed to the Buildable. How this is processed is described in the class level javadoc of ConstructorArgMarshaller.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndroidManifestDescription, ExportFileDescription, GenAidlDescription, IosBinaryDescription, IosLibraryDescription, IosResourceDescription, IosTestDescription, OsxResourceDescription, PythonLibraryDescription, XcodeNativeDescription, XcodeProjectConfigDescription

    public interface Description<T extends ConstructorArg>
    The Source of Truth about a Buildable, providing mechanisms to expose the arguments that rules derived from the Buildable take and providing a factory for those Buildables. It is expected that instances of this class are stateless.

      • getBuildRuleType

        BuildRuleType getBuildRuleType()
        Returns:
        The BuildRuleType being described.

      • createUnpopulatedConstructorArg

        T createUnpopulatedConstructorArg()
        Returns:
        An instance of the argument that must later be passed to createBuildable(BuildRuleParams, ConstructorArg).
        See Also:
        ConstructorArgMarshaller

      • createBuildable

        Buildable createBuildable(BuildRuleParams params,
                        T args)
        Parameters:
        args - A constructor argument, as returned by createUnpopulatedConstructorArg().
        Returns:
        The Buildable that describes the default flavour of the rule being described.
